title: Emerald and Diamond Peacock Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: this exquisite Haaram features dazzling brilliant-cut Diamonds (5.53 carats)
two captivating oval-cut Emeralds (5.38 carats) and fourteen lustrous South Sea Pearls (16.40 carats). The gold boasts a rich Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: This Haaram showcases a classic peacock design, a symbol of beauty and prosperity in South Indian culture. The central pendant features a larger emerald, surrounded by intricate diamond detailing. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of grace and sophistication. The necklace employs a 'kundan' like stone setting to enhance gem brilliance. The total Gross Weight of this necklace is 63.850 grams.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of rich gold
creamy white of the South Sea Pearls. This traditional combination is revered for its auspiciousness.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations such as weddings (Vivaham)
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Itâ€™s also ideal for cultural events and festivals.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a piece of heritage. It's handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, known for their expertise in creating exquisite South Indian jewelry. The peacock design represents grace and royalty, making it a truly unique and valuable investment. Its timeless design ensures that it will be cherished for generations.
